Master Multitasking with Floating Picture-in-picture (aka PiP) on Every Video Platform, Including YouTube.

Features:

- Enable picture-in-picture mode for videos effortlessly.
- Seamlessly integrated with the YouTube player.
- Activate on any video directly from the toolbar.
